scripts.build-client-development: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-client-production: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-client-qa: NODE_ENV=qa BABEL_ENV=qa node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-client-stage: NODE_ENV=stage BABEL_ENV=stage node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-client-qe: NODE_ENV=qe BABEL_ENV=qe node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-server-development: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build-server-production: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build-server-qa: NODE_ENV=qa BABEL_ENV=qa node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build-server-stage: NODE_ENV=stage BABEL_ENV=stage node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build-server-qe: NODE_ENV=qe BABEL_ENV=qe node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build-development: npm run clean && npm run build-client-development && npm run build-server-development
scripts.build-production: npm run clean && npm run build-client-production && npm run build-server-production
scripts.build-qa: npm run clean && npm run build-client-qa && npm run build-server-qa
scripts.build-stage: npm run clean && npm run build-client-stage && npm run build-server-stage
scripts.build-qe: npm run clean && npm run build-client-qe && npm run build-server-qe
scripts.start-development: npm run build-development && NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development babel-node src/server
scripts.start-production: npm run build-production && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production babel-node src/server
scripts.start-qa: npm run build-qa && NODE_ENV=qa BABEL_ENV=qa babel-node src/server
scripts.start-stage: npm run build-stage && NODE_ENV=stage BABEL_ENV=stage babel-node src/server
scripts.start-qe: npm run build-qe && NODE_ENV=qe BABEL_ENV=qe babel-node src/server
scripts.start: npm run clean & NODE_ENV=local BABEL_ENV=local nodemon src/server --watch src/server --watch src/shared --exec babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2
scripts.server: npm run clean && node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js && node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js && pm2-runtime process.yml
